text: LOL.. that is hilarious. Didnt do their research did they..

From what I’ve read, they took code from a wayback machine site, but didn’t know to remove the code from the frame around the page. Really disappointed after the scene in season II where a character saved people by knowing BASIC
meh.. 99% of people will never see that or even understand what they are looking at. So ill let it slide.
I guess. IDK, I won’t lie and say I saw display flex or srcset on first watch, but I did find it weird how many divs there were and how few tables with inline styles lol
